languages.text: {n}Маражай внимательно оглядывает ваших соратников, корчащихся в муках, после чего делает небрежный жест кому-то за пределами вашего взгляда.{/n} "Несите инъекторы. Тут есть мон-кай, которых я обещал Тервантьясу. Дергаться этим отродьям до того, как они окажутся в руках Архимахинатора, ни к чему".

{n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай внимательно оглядывает ваших соратников, корчащихся в муках, после чего делает небрежный жест кому-то за пределами вашего взгляда.{/n} "Несите инъекторы. Тут есть мон-кай, которых я обещал Тервантьясу. Дергаться этим отродьям до того, как они окажутся в руках Архимахинатора, ни к чему".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to struggle until the Archmachinator is done with them."

{n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to struggle until the Archmachinator is done with them."

{n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

{n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai observe attentivement vos compagnons qui se tordent de douleur, puis esquisse un geste nonchalant en direction de quelqu'un que vous ne pouvez voir.{/n} « Apportez les injecteurs. Les mon-keigh que j'ai promis à Tervantias sont parmi eux. Je ne tiens pas à ce qu'ils fassent des leurs avant d'être livrés à l'Archimachinateur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai observe attentivement vos compagnons qui se tordent de douleur, puis fait un geste nonchalant en direction de quelqu'un que vous ne pouvez voir.{/n} « Apportez les injecteurs. Les mon-keigh que j'ai promis à Tervantias sont parmi eux. Il ne faut pas que ces misérables se débattent jusqu'à ce que l'Archimachinateur en ait fini avec eux. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋仔细观察着你那些痛苦的同伴，之后漫不经心地朝其中一个人做了个手势。{/n}“把注射器准备好，我答应带给特万提亚斯的猴子就在这些人里面。没必要再和他们多费工夫了，让首席解体大师来收拾他们吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋仔细观察着你那些痛苦的同伴，之后漫不经心地朝其中一个人做了个手势。{/n}“把注射器准备好，我答应带给特万提亚斯的猴子就在这些人里面。没必要再和他们多费工夫了，让首席阴谋大师来收拾他们吧。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、苦悶の表情を浮かべるあなたたちの仲間をよく見てから、見えない誰かに向かって淡々と身ぶりをした。{/n}「注射器を持ってこい。テルヴァンティアスに約束したモン＝ケイはこの中にいる。アーチマキネイターの手に渡るまで、一歩たりとも動けぬようにしておけ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、苦悶の表情を浮かべるあなたたちの仲間をよく見てから、見えない誰かに向かって淡々と身ぶりをした。{/n}「注射器を持ってこい。テルヴァンティアスに約束したモン＝ケイはこの中にいる。アーチマキネイターの手に渡るまで、一歩たりとも動けぬようにしておけ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai beobachtet deine sich vor Schmerzen windenden Gefährten ganz genau, und zeigt dann beiläufig auf jemanden, den du nicht siehst.{/n} "Holt die Injektoren. Unter denen befindet sich auch {mf|der|die} Chem-Pan-Sey, {mf|den|die} ich Tervantias versprach. Ich will nicht, dass diese Würmer sich nur einen Zentimeter bewegen, bis sie in den Händen des Erzmachinators sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai beobachtet deine sich vor Schmerzen windenden Gefährten ganz genau, und zeigt dann beiläufig auf jemanden, den du nicht siehst.{/n} "Holt die Injektoren. Unter denen befindet sich auch {mf|der|die} Chem-Pan-Sey, {mf|den|die} ich Tervantias versprach. Ich will nicht, dass diese Würmer weiterkämpfen, bis der Erzmachinator mit ihnen fertig ist."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai observa detenidamente cómo tus compañeros se retuercen de agonía y, luego, hace un gesto indiferente a alguien que no alcanzas a ver.{/n} «Traed los inyectores. La mon-keigh que le prometí a Tervantias está entre ellos. No quiero que estos despojos se muevan ni un ápice hasta que estén en manos del Archimaquinador».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai observa detenidamente cómo tus compañeros se retuercen de agonía, luego hace un gesto indiferente a alguien que no alcanzas a ver.{/n} «Traed los inyectores. Los mon-keigh que le prometí a Tervantias están entre ellos. No quiero que estos despojos se resistan hasta que el Archimaquinador haya terminado con ellos».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, ızdırap içinde kıvranan yoldaşlarına yakından baktıktan sonra göremediğin birisini umursamazca işaret ediyor.{/n} "Şırıngaları getir. Tervantias'a vadettiğim mon-keighler bunlar. Başmakinatör'e teslim edene kadar bu itlerin kılı kıpırdamayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a close look at your companions squirming in agony, then gestures nonchalantly to someone you cannot see.{/n} "Bring in the injectors. The mon-keigh I promised to Tervantias are among them. I do not want these wretches to move an inch until they are in the hands of the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, ızdırap içinde kıvranan yoldaşlarına yakından baktıktan sonra göremediğin birisine umursamazca işaret ediyor.{/n} "Şırıngaları getir. Tervantias'a vaat ettiğim mon-keighler bunlar. Başmakinatör'e teslim edene kadar bu itlerin kılı kıpırdamayacak."
